name: Pine_View_Motel
text:
Pine View Motel
"What it lacks in elegance it makes up for in courtesy and privacy. Assignations can be scheduled here without fear of being compromised."
The Pine View Motel was a motel in Twin Peaks, Washington.
Motel located "a stone's throw from the Double R Diner". Among the motel's offerings were privacy and a continental breakfast.
